articles.title: Marvel's Shang-Chi jabs, flips Asian American film cliches - CNA
articles.description: Is the first Asian-led superhero flick powerful enough to make Hollywood finally bury tired story tropes and support projects by actors and filmmakers of Asian descent?

articles.title: Reports: Japan princess to reject wedding payout, move to US - The Star Online
articles.description: TOKYO: The course of true love never did run smooth, but after public controversy and a wedding delay, Japan’s Princess Mako (pic) is reportedly set to tie the knot and move to America.
